scripts.build: echo "Triggering build from apps/test-app/package.json. Initial CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Listing /workspace contents:" && ls -la /workspace && echo "Displaying /workspace/package.json (relevant parts):" && cat /workspace/package.json | grep -E '("scripts"|build-test)' -A 5 && echo "Attempting to run root build-test script using --prefix /workspace..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --prefix /workspace run build-test
scripts.start: echo "Triggering start from apps/test-app/package.json. Initial CWD: $(pwd)" && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --prefix /workspace run start-test
